member.name: T:TingenWebService.ProjectInfo
member.summary: Provides additional information about the Tingen Web Service.

remarks.para:
About the Tingen Web Service
Netsmart's Avatar™ is a behavioral health EHR that offers a recovery-focused suite of solutions that
leverage real-time analytics and clinical decision support to drive value-based care.
While Avatar™ is a robust platform, it isn't perfect. The good news is that you can extend myAvatar™
functionality via Netsmart's Avatar™ Web Services, and/or custom web services that are written by other
Avatar™ users.
Tingen is one such custom web service which includes various tools and utilities for Avatar™ that aren't
included in the official release, and provides a solid foundation for building additional functionality
quickly and efficiently

Associated projects
Tingen Web Service (front-end)
Outpost32 (back-end)

member.name: T:TingenWebService.TingenWebService
member.summary: The entry class for the Tingen Web Service.

remarks.para:
This class doesn't do much actual work, and should remain fairly static. For the most part, it just hands information to Outpost31, where the heavy lifting is done.
There are two methods in this class, both of which are required and should not be modified:
For more information about the Tingen Web Service, please see .

member.name: P:TingenWebService.TingenWebService.ExeAsmName
member.remarks:
The name of the Executing Assembly is a required component of all log files, as it is used to identify the class that is creating the log.
This is defined at the start of each class, so it can be used at any time that a log needs to be created.

member.name: P:TingenWebService.TingenWebService.WsvcVer
member.summary: The current version of the Tingen Web Service.

member.name: P:TingenWebService.TingenWebService.AvtrSys
member.summary: The Avatar System that the Tingen Web Service will interface with.
member.remarks: The Avatar System is different than an Avatar System Code.

member.name: M:TingenWebService.TingenWebService.GetVersion
member.summary: Get the current version of the Tingen Web Service.
member.remarks: This method is required and should not be modified.
member.returns: The current version of the Tingen Web Service.

member.name: M:TingenWebService.TingenWebService.RunScript(ScriptLinkStandard.Objects.OptionObject2015,System.String)
member.summary: The entry point for the Tingen Web Service.

list.item: This method is required and should not be modified.
Trace Logs can't go here because the logging infrastructure hasn't been initialized yet.
If Avatar doesn't pass an or , the Tingen Web Service will fail, and a Critical Failure Log will be created.

member.param: The original Script Parameter that is sent from Avatar.
member.returns: An representing the result of the Script Parameter request.
